channel.title: BattleScape Blitz (Post 2)
channel.description:
I posted this about a 2 weeks back, thats why title says post 2.
BattleScape Blitz! After all this time the server will finally be going on this Sunday! Finally!
I have been coding this server for a good few weeks now, and heres the details to the server.
- Quick tutorial Island to get you started.
- Depending on your attack style (accurate, agressive, etc) will depedn on your emote for diffrent weapons (so for instance, a dagger might have stab emote for accurate, and slash emote for agressive)
- The absolute best magic system made yet! No rune requirements, only levels. Correct projectiles, and entangling spells hold NPCs also. When you cast a spell and its a failed attempt, you still launch the projectile but it finishes with a splash! The most ive ever seen is a splash period when you miss, and thats very few servers there.
- Working Autocasting.
- Working projectiles depending on your weapon (msot of the time). Better projectiles then what I released, they arent wavy through the air, they are normal.
- Most skills. I have a base for all skills except for maybe 3, one of which was replaced by trimming anyway.
- Trimming. Added custom trimming skill with a custom icon if you use my client. Trim rune armor to make (g), (t), and gilded.
- Atleast 17 training areas, when using the emotes to teleport.
- To unlock Ancients, you have to kill a series of diffrent NPCs (sort of like a quest).
- Working special attacks. For weapons that double hit, theres a small delay in between though.
- Tzhaar minigame. Use an emote to get there. If you die while in the area, you wont loose items. The NPCs in the arena are agressive (attack you when in range automatically), and if you get 10 kills (score doesnt reset when you die) you recieve one special attack potion, whic hcures i think 40% special energy.
- Use the quest tab for help. Theres a help menu, and ancents menu, char button, save button (althought there is autosave), a rules button, and a change frame button.
- Change Frame button. This button si found in the quest tab. Click it and the text "Palyers" at the top of the screen will change. Keep clicking it for diffrent text. You can display your slayer task, how many kills of certain npcs, and such with it.
- Clicking on the skill icons in the skill tab will display a menu for that skill.
- To obtain a barrows weapon, kill the correct brother (100% drop). use an emote to get there.
- Whips are rare drops from abby demons. Emote to get there.
- The KBD will rarely drop things such as d chain and d2h which are rare. Emote to get there.
- There is a final fantasy style pk system (sorta like a minigame) were you can only attack 'once' once youve been attacked or if you havent attacked since you entered the arena (you dont loose items apon death). PVP emote.
- Jad drops Fire capes 100% of the time. They are rare and untradeable. use emtoe to get there.
Almost all dragon weapons except - d2h, d spear, and d axe - require a certain amount of kills to weild. Heres the lsit for that: [code] Dragon Scimitar - 10 Jungle Demon Kills Dragon Mace - 10 Blue Dragon Kills Dragon Battleaxe - 10 Blue Dragon Kills Dragon Halberd - 10 Tyras Guard Kills Ancient Staff - Finish Ancients 'Mini-Game' Zamorak God Staff - 20 Zamorak Battle Mages Saradomin God Staff - 20 Saradomin Battle Mages Guthix God Staff - 20 Guthix Battle Mages Dragon Dagger - 15 Tree Spirit Kills Dragon Longsword - 15 Tree Spirit Kills Crystal Bow - 20 Elf Kills [/code]
[url=http://battlescapeserver.tripod.com]http://battlescapeserver.741.com[/url] http://battlescapeserver.741.com
Go to the screenshots page to view 51 freaken screenshots of the server lol.

item.title: BattleScape Blitz (Post 2)
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

I posted this about a 2 weeks back, thats why title says post 2.

BattleScape Blitz! After all this time the server will finally be going on this Sunday! Finally!

I have been coding this server for a good few weeks now, and heres the details to the server.

  • Quick tutorial Island to get you started.

  • Depending on your attack style (accurate, agressive, etc) will depedn on your emote for diffrent weapons (so for instance, a dagger might have stab emote for accurate, and slash emote for agressive)

  • The absolute best magic system made yet! No rune requirements, only levels. Correct projectiles, and entangling spells hold NPCs also. When you cast a spell and its a failed attempt, you still launch the projectile but it finishes with a splash! The most ive ever seen is a splash period when you miss, and thats very few servers there.

  • Working Autocasting.

  • Working projectiles depending on your weapon (msot of the time). Better projectiles then what I released, they arent wavy through the air, they are normal.

  • Most skills. I have a base for all skills except for maybe 3, one of which was replaced by trimming anyway.

  • Trimming. Added custom trimming skill with a custom icon if you use my client. Trim rune armor to make (g), (t), and gilded.

  • Atleast 17 training areas, when using the emotes to teleport.

  • To unlock Ancients, you have to kill a series of diffrent NPCs (sort of like a quest).

  • Working special attacks. For weapons that double hit, theres a small delay in between though.

  • Tzhaar minigame. Use an emote to get there. If you die while in the area, you wont loose items. The NPCs in the arena are agressive (attack you when in range automatically), and if you get 10 kills (score doesnt reset when you die) you recieve one special attack potion, whic hcures i think 40% special energy.

  • Use the quest tab for help. Theres a help menu, and ancents menu, char button, save button (althought there is autosave), a rules button, and a change frame button.

  • Change Frame button. This button si found in the quest tab. Click it and the text “Palyers” at the top of the screen will change. Keep clicking it for diffrent text. You can display your slayer task, how many kills of certain npcs, and such with it.

  • Clicking on the skill icons in the skill tab will display a menu for that skill.

  • Whips are rare drops from abby demons. Emote to get there.

  • The KBD will rarely drop things such as d chain and d2h which are rare. Emote to get there.

  • There is a final fantasy style pk system (sorta like a minigame) were you can only attack ‘once’ once youve been attacked or if you havent attacked since you entered the arena (you dont loose items apon death). PVP emote.

  • Jad drops Fire capes 100% of the time. They are rare and untradeable. use emtoe to get there.

Almost all dragon weapons except - d2h, d spear, and d axe - require a certain amount of kills to weild.
Heres the lsit for that:
